Flub.Name: Dune Sea
Flub.Description: Creates large dune fields with fewer variations.

Flub.Name: Chaotic
Flub.Description: Creates smaller dune areas with larger variations.

Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: The strength of the dunes' undulation.

Flub.Name: Height
Flub.Description: The height of the tallest dune.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
